Input:oppType.title: oppType
Input:oppType.description: A text input from the customer to determine if the customer would like to rent or buy the property.

Input:price.title: price
Input:price.description: The customer's budget or the maximum price of the property that the customer is searching for.

Input:location.title: location
Input:location.description: The location or area of the property that the customer is searching for.

Input:additional_detail.title: additional detail
Input:additional_detail.description: A text that indicates additional details of the property, such as property type (e.g. House/Apartment), number of bedrooms, number of bathrooms, amenities, features, and other relevant details.
